content_banner_home_one: Flocks will change the way businesses are funded and supported. How everyday people invest and the way we grow our economy.
content_banner_home_two: We provide an AI-powered platform that assists small and medium-sized businesses to seek capital and grow sustainably
content_investor_home_one: Flocks AI, is a platform for Vietnamese people, supports the business appraisal
business_submits: Business submits their file on website of Flock AI
provide_related_documents: Provide related documents (if required) to Flock AI for business valuation
expert_team: Expert team of Flock AI will help business with appraisai: legal, valuation,...
our_team_will_contact: Our team will contact to the business to confirm information, legally consult and give the suitable strategy (if yes)
open_fundraising_campaign_on_Flock_AI: Open fundraising campaign on Flock AI
when_business_passes: When business passes the appraise round, the information will be public on the Flock AI platform.
Flock_AI_will_help_business: Flock AI will help business to connect effectively to the organizations, individuals who have demand to invest to the project, guarantee the disbursesment smoothly and legally
Flocks_AI_brings: Flocks AI brings investment opportunities in startups to everyone
the_products_appeared_on_the_market: The products appeared on the market
description_what_flocks: Flock AI is a smart funding platform only for Vietnamese people, providing everyone, from individuals to angel investors, venture capital,  investment organizations with variety of investment opportunities from the very small accumulation. Businesses and projects that want to raise capital must complete a inspection and appraisal before being listed on the platform.
how_does_flock_ai_secure: 2. How does Flock AI secure user data and information?
description_how_does_flock_ai_secure: Any personal or business data saved by Flock AI for compliance, examination, verification and reconciliation purposes is sucure. Flocks AI commit to maintain as well update continuously the system to increase security and data storage.Besides, all communications and sensitive data on FLock AI platform have been SSL encrypted in transit
flock_ai_is_being_guaranteed: 3. Flock AI is being guaranteed by which organizations?
description_flock_ai_is_being_guaranteed: Flocks AI đang được bảo chứng bởi:
The world's leading cryptocurrency Payment Gateway
Legal & investment consulting partner with 15 years of experience
who_can_become_an_investor_on_Flocks_AI: 4. Who can become an investor on Flocks AI?
description_who_can_become_an_investor_o: Flocks AI offers investment opportunities in the future to all users over 18 years old having Vietnamese nationality no matter where they are in the world. However, some users can be limited to invest depending on local laws and local regulatory licensing requirements.

In addition, businesses that raise capatal on Flock AI also have the right to give different requirements for valid investor according to the goal of each funding round. Therefore, users need to read carefully the information on the campaign homepage before making an investment decision.
how_much_money_can_I_invest_on_Flocks_AI: 5. How much money can I invest on Flocks AI?
description_how_much_money_can_I_invest_: The amount of money you can invest on the Flocks AI platform mainly depends on the type of asset you are investing in. You can easily invest in profitable opportunities from only 1,000,000 VNĐ. Some specific fundraising campaigns will limit a minimum and maximum investment, so you need to read carefully the onformation on the project page to make a eligible investment. Flocks AI commits to transparency of all information related to fundraising for each project. Dishonesty in the process of providing personal and income information can lead to cancellation of investments and freezing of account
what_can_I_invest_on_Flocks_AI: 6. What can I invest on Flocks AI?
description_what_can_I_invest_on_Flocks_: Investment products on Flocks AI are diversified with many different fields and industries: Health, Fashion, Real Estate, Restaurants & Hotels, Sports, Technology, ... on 4 main groups including Startups - SMEs - Web3 - Meaningful projects
In the future, Flocks AI will expand products, seek more diversified investment opportunities, and give users more choices.
how_can_I_invest_on_Flocks_AI: 7. How can I invest on Flocks AI?
description_how_can_I_invest_on_Flocks_A: To become an investor on Flocks AI, you can follow these steps:
Step 1: Visit the homepage, click Sign Up
Step 2: Register or log in with your Apple, Google, Facebook or Email account
Step 3: After account registration / login success, you need to complete the initialization step of investor profile in the registration form
why_do_I_have_to_verify_my_identity_when: 8. Why do I have to verify my identity when I register to invest?
description_why_do_I_have_to_verify_my_i: There are no user fees required when making investments on the Flocks AI platform.
